name: Happy Canyon
description:
Introduction

It is no longer necessary to access via Burr Point. There is an easy, non-technical hike in on an old mining road that is 3 miles one way. Then the cairned trail down to the river. Access is from the end of Poison Spring Road Left bench road.

Descent

Exit
